content: these high waisted wide legged crochet shorts are truly modern crochet fashion for the real world as easy to make as they are wearable they ll look fantastic with the cotton rope drawstring but they are just as easily worn with a belt or crochet drawstring pdf pattern includes women s sizes xs-xxl and a follow along video tutorial really cute really simple very fun to make materials #1 fingering weight yarn i used lindy chain in color swan #1 fingering weight yarn 3 mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle stitch marker 6-8 ft of cotton rope for the drawstring optional skill easy notes this pattern is written in english us terminology this pattern made in us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 730 810 900 980 1070 1160 yards gauge blocked waistband 28 single_crochet x 26 row = 4 body 21 half_double_crochet x 14 row = 4 measurements after blocked waist circumference 23 07 24 61 26 15 27 69 29 23 30 76 hip circumference 51 42 54 85 58 28 61 71 65 14 68 57 length 14 14 14 71 14 71 15 42 16 thank you for stopping by happy crocheting
